markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Magic with this trait involves shadows or the energy of the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11). Creatures with this trait are natives of the Shadow Plane. They can survive the basic environmental effects of the Shadow Plane.
name: Shadow
